name: ReTake
description:
Take back a city held by a militant organization in this tactical strategy game. = Description =

This is the technical aplha of ReTake. This version represents the Minimum Viable Product. The core mechanics of the game are implemented. It just lacks comfort,  lots of content and polish.

In ReTake, you take control of a small group of experts to take back a small town in a fictional state. The game is divided into two states. In the first, you give orders to your units. After you lay out your plan you will switch into the play mode and see if your tactics work out or if you send your troops into a hopeless combat.

= Controls =
  • Use W A S D to move the camera over the battlefield.
  • Zoom in or out with the SCROLL WHEEL
  • Q or E will rotate the map
  • Select units with the LMB
  • Command selected units with the RMB
  • Use SPACEBAR to leave the command mode and Pause/Resume the game
= What you can expect in the final version =
  • Command individual units
    • Different classes with each own set of abilities
    • Customize the look by equipment options
  • Tactical city combat
    • Fight your enemies out of the occupied buildings
    • Complete exciting operations with special bosses
  • Gear up
    • Loot to specialize your units with a lot of different equipment.
    • Research perks to give you advantages over the battlefield
  • Campaign
    • Story driven operations 
    • Handcrafted city

= Feedback Form =

After playing ReTake, I would be joyful if you could give me feedback about  your time in the game.
